hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin 'Amr said:"A man came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and asked him for permission to go for Jihad. He said: 'Are your parents alive?' He said: 'Yes.' He said: 'Then strive for their sake

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي التَّخَلُّفِ لِمَنْ لَهُ وَالِدَانِ .
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing The One Who Has Two Parents To Stay Behind
